name: Antimonium crudum
Relationship: Antidote: Hepar.Compare: ANTIMONIUM CHLORIDUM. Butter of Antimony. (A remedy for cancer. Mucous membranes destroyed. Abrasions. Skin cold and clammy. Great prostration of strength. Dose - third trituration.)Compare: Kermes mineral - Stibiato sulph. rub. (Bronchitis.) Also Puls., Ipecac, Sulph.ANTIMON. JODAT. (Uterine hyperplasia; humid asthma. Pneumonia and bronchitis; loss of strength, and appetite, yellowish skin, sweaty, dull and drowsy.) In sub-acute and chronic colds in chest which have extended downwards from head and have fastened themselves upon the bronchial tubes in the form of hard, croupy cough with a decided wheeze and inability to raise the sputum, especially in the aged and weak patients (Bacmeister). Stage of resolution of pneumonia slow and delayed.Complementary: Sulph.

Urine: Frequent, with burning, and backache; turbid and foul odor
Stool: Diarrhoea after acids, sour wine, baths, over eating; slimy, flatulent stools
Diarrhea alternates with constipation, especially in old people
Hard lumps mixed with watery discharge
Mucous piles, continued oozing of mucus
Head: Suppressed eruptions
Headache with great loss of hair
Aching, worse in vertex, on ascending, from bathing, from disordered stomach, especially from eating candy or drinking acid wine
Heaviness in forehead, with vertigo; nausea, and nosebleed
Fever: Intermittent with disgust, nausea, vomiting, eructations, coated tongue, diarrhoea
Stomach: Gouty metastasis to stomach and bowels
Gastric and intestinal complaints from bread and pastry, acids, sour wine, cold bathing, overheating, hot weather
After nursing, the child vomits its milk in curds, and refuses to nurse afterwards, and is very cross
Respiratory: Loss of voice from becoming overheated
Cough worse coming into warm room, with burning sensation in chest, itching of chest, oppression
Eyes: Dull, sunken, red, itch, inflamed, agglutinated
Face: Pimples, pustules, and boils on face
Yellow crusted eruption on cheeks and chin
Nose: Nostrils chapped and covered with crusts
Eczema of nostrils, sore, cracked, and scurfy
Male: Eruption on scrotum and about genitals
Ears: Redness; swelling; pain in eustachian tube
Mind: Cross and contradictive; whatever is done fails to give satisfaction
Sulky; does not wish to speak
Child cannot bear to be touched or looked at
Back: Itching and pain of neck and back
Female: Before menses, toothache; menses too early and profuse
Menses suppressed from cold bathing, with feeling of pressure in pelvis and tenderness in ovarian region
Skin: Scaly, pustular eruption with burning and itching, worse at night
Throat: Much thick yellowish mucus from posterior nares
Extremities: Nails brittle; grow out of shape
Feet very tender; covered with large horny places
Horny warts on hands and soles
Weakness and shaking of hands in writing followed by offensive flatulence

details: For homeopathic employment, the mental symptoms, and those of the gastric sphere, determine its choice. EXCESSIVE IRRITABILITY AND FRETFULNESS, together with a THICKLY-COATED WHITE TONGUE, are true guiding symptoms to many forms of disease calling for this remedy. All the conditions are aggravated by HEAT AND COLD BATHING. Cannot bear heat of sun. Tendency to grow fat. An absence of pain, where it could be expected, is noticeable. Gout with gastric symptoms.
